Key Match Events: Son Heung-min scored a penalty in the 11th minute
Son Heung-min scored a header just before halftime
Jung Seung-hyun added a header off a free kick from Son
Pre-Game Insights: South Korea is looking to qualify for the World Cup for the 11th straight time
China is aiming to reach the tournament for only the second time
Post-Match Reflections: South Korean coach Jurgen Klinsmann said China had scoring opportunities but South Korea's performance lifted the atmosphere for them
Miscellaneous Highlights: China was held to a 3-0 defeat by South Korea
